alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 30 at 11:19AM PDT until August 30 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY CREATING ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ACROSS EASTERN NAPA COUNTY... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 504 North Bay Interior Mountains. * TIMING...through 8 PM PDT Wednesday. * WINDS...North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum humidity of 13 to 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs of 90 to 96. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
